title: Putting Up Blinders (w/Jessica Kirson & Andy Fiori)
description: B-Rod & Christine dish the dirt on ejaculation with a pulsating edition of “Cum Talk”. Dan & Jay are joined by Jessica Kirson and Andy Fiori as they detail their reactions when other comics eclipsed their careers. The next generation of Bonfire family is on the way and the crew discuss their hopes and desires for their children ending with some great advise from a father to his son.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
